      • findPreferredScheme

        public CodeStyleScheme findPreferredScheme(java.lang.String preferredSchemeName)
        Attempts to find a scheme with a given name or an alternative suitable scheme.
        Parameters:
        preferredSchemeName - The scheme name to find or null for the currently selected scheme.
        Returns:
        A found scheme or a default scheme if the scheme name was not found or, if neither exists or the scheme name is null, the currently selected scheme.
